# arifOS APPS — 7-Layer Application Stack
# Location: https://arifos.arif-fazil.com/llms.txt
# Version: v55.4-SEAL
# Authority: Muhammad Arif bin Fazil (888 Judge)
# Status: SOVEREIGNLY_SEALED
# Last Updated: 2026-02-06

---

## WHAT THIS IS

arifOS APPS is the **implementation layer** for constitutional AI governance — the 7-layer deployment architecture that brings APEX THEORY into production.

**Tagline:** "AI That Can't Lie to You"

**Motto:** *"Ditempa bukan diberi"* — Forged, not given.

---

## QUICK START

```bash
# Install arifOS
pip install arifos

# Verify installation
python -c "import arifos; print(arifos.__version__)"
```

**Live Demo:** https://arif-fazil.com
**Constitutional Canon:** https://apex.arif-fazil.com
**Human Context:** https://arif-fazil.com/llms.txt

---

## THE 7-LAYER STACK (L1-L7)

| Layer | Name | Purpose | Status | Entry Point |
|-------|------|---------|--------|-------------|
| **L1** | PROMPT | Zero-context system prompt | Ready | Copy prompt |
| **L2** | SKILLS | Parameterized templates | Ready | YAML + Python |
| **L3** | WORKFLOW | Documented sequences | Ready | SOPs |
| **L4** | TOOLS | 9 MCP tools (production) | Production | MCP server |
| **L5** | AGENTS | 4-agent federation | Stubs | Agent stubs |
| **L6** | INSTITUTION | Trinity multi-agent system | Design | Trinity spec |
| **L7** | AGI | Constitutional AGI research | Research | Research only |

---

## L4: MCP — 9 Canonical Tools (v55.4-SEAL)

**MCP Server:** `aaamcp.arif-fazil.com`
**Runtime:** Python 3.12 + FastMCP 2.14.4
**Source:** https://github.com/ariffazil/arifOS/blob/main/aaa_mcp/server.py

### MCP Configuration

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "arifos": {
      "command": "python",
      "args": ["-m", "aaa_mcp", "stdio"]
    }
  }
}
```

### 9 Canonical Tools

| # | Tool | Stage | Engine | Floors | Function |
|---|------|-------|--------|--------|----------|
| 1 | `init_gate` | 000 | INIT | F11, F12 | Session bootstrap, injection defense |
| 2 | `agi_sense` | 111 | AGI | F2, F4 | Input parsing, intent detection |
| 3 | `agi_think` | 222 | AGI | F2, F4, F7 | Hypothesis generation, divergent reasoning |
| 4 | `agi_reason` | 333 | AGI | F2, F4, F7 | Deep logic chains, convergent reasoning |
| 5 | `asi_empathize` | 444 | ASI | F5, F6 | Stakeholder modeling, impact mapping |
| 6 | `asi_align` | 555-666 | ASI | F5, F6, F9 | Constitutional alignment, floor validation |
| 7 | `apex_verdict` | 888 | APEX | F3, F8 | Final judgment, 9-paradox equilibrium |
| 8 | `reality_search` | External | AGI | F2, F7 | External fact verification, grounding |
| 9 | `vault_seal` | 999 | VAULT | F1, F3 | Immutable ledger seal, Merkle persistence |

### Trinity Pipeline

```
init_gate → [AGI (Mind) || ASI (Heart)] → apex_verdict → vault_seal

AGI lane:  agi_sense → agi_think → agi_reason
ASI lane:  asi_empathize → asi_align
External:  reality_search (available at any stage)
```

---

## THE SIX MEMORY BANDS (L0-L5)

| Band | Purpose | Confidence | TTL Hot | Canonical |
|------|---------|------------|---------|-----------|
| **L0_VAULT** | Constitutional law | 1.0 (LAW) | PERMANENT | YES |
| **L1_LEDGER** | Sealed decisions | 1.0 (SEALED) | 90 days | YES |
| **L2_ACTIVE** | Volatile working state | Variable | 7 days | Session |
| **L3_PHOENIX** | Amendment proposals | <=0.85 | 90 days | PENDING |
| **L4_WITNESS** | Observations, scars | <=0.85 | 90 days | SUGGESTION |
| **L5_VOID** | Rejected facts | N/A | 24-90h | NEVER |

---

## VERDICT ROUTING

| Verdict | Meaning | Band | Canonical |
|---------|---------|------|-----------|
| **SEAL** | Approved | L1_LEDGER | YES |
| **PARTIAL** | Under review | L3_PHOENIX | NO |
| **SABAR** | Sealed with reason | L1_LEDGER (flagged) | YES |
| **HOLD_888** | Await human | L3_PHOENIX | NO |
| **VOID** | Rejected | L5_VOID | NEVER |

### Local (stdio — Claude Code / Cursor)
```bash
pip install arifos
python -m aaa_mcp stdio
```

### Cloud (SSE — Production)
```
Endpoint: https://aaamcp.arif-fazil.com/sse
Protocol: Model Context Protocol (SSE)
```
